page.title: 14HOUSING BURNDEN
page.content: TERRACE The most popular form of housing in the "Burnden"area are TERRACED.These houses attract mostly new married couples,because they are cheaper than other kinds of housing.They were built around the end of the 19th century. SEMI-DETACHED The next most popular form of housing, semi-detached,attract the middle aged couples with families.They were built around the mid 20th century. BUNGALOWS Bungalows attract the retired couples. This is because they are single storeys. DETACHED Detached housing are one of the most expensive form of living around the " Burnden"area.
